languages.text: "Окраинный мир с нулевой ценностью для Империума. Приказом Леди Теодоры был удален из всех навигационных карт". {n}Мрачно пожевав челюстью, маршал отводит взгляд.{/n} "Его безопасность практически не вызывала сомнений. До настоящего времени".

traits.locale_text: "Окраинный мир с нулевой ценностью для Империума. Приказом Леди Теодоры был удален из всех навигационных карт". {n}Мрачно пожевав челюстью, Маршал отводит взгляд.{/n} "Его безопасность практически не вызывала сомнений. До настоящего времени".

languages.text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."
languages.original_text: "Окраинный мир с нулевой ценностью для Империума. Приказом Леди Теодоры был удален из всех навигационных карт". {n}Мрачно пожевав челюстью, маршал отводит взгляд.{/n} "Его безопасность практически не вызывала сомнений. До настоящего времени".

traits.locale_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}Chewing grimly at his jaw, the Marshal averts his gaze.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

"At my insistence, it was struck from all astrogational data. It was once a peripheral world that had no value to tithe collectors, which is why its disappearance did not raise many questions. No one cared about a planet that had nothing to give."

"A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

"A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

"At my insistence, it was struck from all astrogational data. It was once a peripheral world with no value to tithe collectors, which is why its disappearance did not raise many questions. No one cared about a planet that had nothing to give."

"At my insistence, it was struck from all astrogational data. It was once a peripheral world with no value to tithe collectors, which is why its disappearance did not raise many questions. No one cared about a planet that had nothing to give."

"At my insistence, it was struck from all astrogational data. It was once a peripheral world with no value to tithe collectors, which is why its disappearance did not raise many questions. No one cared about a planet that had nothing to give."

"A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}Chewing grimly at his jaw, the Marshal averts his gaze.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

languages.text: « Un monde reculé n'a aucune valeur aux yeux de l'Imperium. Il a été rayé de toutes les bases de données astronavigationnelles par ordre de dame Théodora. » {n}L'air sombre, le maréchal serre la mâchoire et détourne le regard.{/n} « Sa sécurisation ne faisait aucun doute. Jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

traits.locale_text: « Un monde reculé n'a aucune valeur aux yeux de l'Imperium. Il a été rayé de toutes les bases de données astronavigationnelles par ordre de dame Théodora. » {n}L'air sombre, le maréchal serre la mâchoire et détourne le regard.{/n} « Sa sécurisation ne faisait aucun doute. Jusqu'à aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: «Un mundo periférico carente de valor para el Imperium. Por orden de lady Theodora fue extirpado de todos los datos de astronavegación». {n}El Mariscal aprieta la mandíbula y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Su seguridad había sido considerada indiscutible hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

traits.locale_text: «Un mundo periférico carente de valor para el Imperium. Por orden de lady Theodora fue extirpado de todos los datos de astronavegación». {n}El Mariscal aprieta la mandíbula y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Su seguridad había sido considerada indiscutible hasta ahora».

languages.text: “那是个对帝国没有任何价值的边缘世界。根据西奥多拉夫人的命令，所有关于它的星图数据都被销毁了。”{n}元帅面色阴沉，咬紧牙关，移开了目光。{/n}“它的安全性本该毋庸置疑，但最近，情况发生了变化。”
languages.original_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

traits.locale_text: “那是个对帝国没有任何价值的边缘世界。根据西奥多拉夫人的命令，所有关于它的星图数据都被销毁了。”{n}元帅面色阴沉，咬紧牙关，移开了目光。{/n}“它的安全性本该毋庸置疑，但最近，情况发生了变化。”

languages.text: "Eine Randwelt ohne Wert für das Imperium. Sie wurde auf Befehl von Lady Theodora aus allen astrogationalen Daten entfernt." {n}Der Marschall wendet grimmig den Kopf ab.{/n} "Seine Sicherheit stand völlig außer Frage. Bis jetzt."
languages.original_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Randwelt ohne Wert für das Imperium. Sie wurde auf Befehl von Lady Theodora aus allen astrogationalen Daten entfernt." {n}Der Marschall wendet grimmig den Kopf ab.{/n} "Seine Sicherheit stand völlig außer Frage. Bis jetzt."

languages.text: 「私の勧めで、その星はすべての星図データから削除しました。そこはかつて周辺惑星で租税収集者にとって何の価値もありませんでした。だから、その星が星図から消えても疑問は生じませんでした。利益にならない星のことを誰も気に留めなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "At my insistence, it was struck from all astrogational data. It was once a peripheral world with no value to tithe collectors, which is why its disappearance did not raise many questions. No one cared about a planet that had nothing to give."

traits.locale_text: 「私の勧めで、その星はすべての星図データから削除しました。そこはかつて周辺惑星で租税収集者にとって何の価値もありませんでした。だから、その星が星図から消えても疑問は生じませんでした。利益にならない星のことを誰も気に留めなかったのです」

languages.text: "İmparatorluk için hiçbir değeri olmayan bir uç dünya. Leydi Theodora'nın emriyle tüm astrotacılık verilerinden silinmiş." {n}Miralay, bakışlarını çevirip çenesini sertçe oynatıyor.{/n} "Güvenliği, su götürmez seviyede kabul ediliyordu. Şu ana dek."
languages.original_text: "A fringe world of no value to the Imperium. By order of Lady Theodora, it was stricken from all astrogational data." {n}The Marshal grimly works his jaw as he looks away.{/n} "Its security was considered beyond doubt. Until now."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk için hiçbir değeri olmayan bir uç dünya. Leydi Theodora'nın emriyle tüm astrotacılık verilerinden silinmiş." {n}Miralay, bakışlarını çevirip çenesini sertçe oynatıyor.{/n} "Güvenliği, su götürmez seviyede kabul ediliyordu. Şu ana dek."
